page.title: 03SKERRIES EXTERNAL TRANSPORT
page.content:
For a small island Skerries is well supplied with transport. There is one islander type{plane}that flies between Tingwall and here. It can be chartered and is also used as an{ambulance. There is a special discount for Isles people. We are having a new{airstrip built which was started on the 6th of April 1985 and will take 6 weeks.
We got a new{ferry}called the{Filla}in November 1983. it is a steel boat (80 feet long) and was a purpose built in {Flekkefjord}in{Norway.}It carries passengers, freight and cars. It comes 3 times a week making a return trip to {Lerwick}on{Tuesadays, Fridays}and a single trip to{Whalsay}on{Sundays.}We are getting a new pier for the Filla with{roll-on roll-off facilities}this will be completed in the Autumn of 1985.
